sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_snc_servicenow_s_servicenow_scripting"> <x_snc_servicenow_s_servicenow_scripting action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <code_url/> <code_url_2/> <details/> <example_steps/> <example_url/> <module/> <number>SNSCRIPT0001119</number> <replaced_by/> <script>function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {  if (newValue == 'existing') g_form.setDisplay('account', true); else g_form.setDisplay('account', false); } </script> <script_2/> <script_type>Client Script</script_type> <short_description>To Hide a Variable on a Record Producer Based on the Value of Another Variable</short_description> <state>Submitted</state> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2016-08-28 19:07:20</sys_created_on> <sys_id>032be78113296240e5adbd522244b096</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2016-08-28 19:07:20</sys_updated_on> <tested_on_helsinki/> </x_snc_servicenow_s_servicenow_scripting> </record_update>
